title: Describe
snippet: Capturing the essence of urban environments in rich detail
description: In urban planning, 'describe' entails providing an intricate account of spaces, from their physical attributes to the social dynamics within them. This process helps planners communicate what exists, laying a foundation for deeper exploration and understanding of how spaces function.
literature: The Death and Life of Great American Cities by Jane Jacobs
Urban Design: The Architecture of Towns and Cities by Paul D. Spreiregen
Great Streets by Allan B. Jacobs
